dct_description_sm: Plate 1 of 2 sheet map of Paterson, N.J. and the "burned district" as of February 1902 following a large fire earlier that year. Buildings are color coded and city hall, police headquarters, churches and other landmarks noted. Area of fire outlined in red.
One corner is signifantly frayed and disintegrated.
